front.title: An Object-Centric Name Space for Various Communication Objects

abstract.t: This draft suggests a name space for identifier based Internet that has been considered to support the future Internet for mobile environment. The suggested name space considers a host-centric for the current stage as well as an object-centric for the next stage. To consider scalability and distributed architecture, the format of the name space consists of object category, local name, domain name, and parameters.
